6Cg7higxQ1w.description:
Get Twilight Survivors on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2788310/Twilight_Survivors/

A time-limited survival game infused with rogue-lite elements and an adorable art style! The world has plunged into darkness, and you are its sole beacon of hope. Will you endure until dawn, or succumb to repeated deaths in your quest? Fear not, for you can collect more coins to arm yourself!
_____________________________________________________________________

9rD-m0oLHx0.description:
Get DICEOMANCER: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2501600/DICEOMANCER/

DICEOMANCER is a roguelike deck-building game. Though you long for a peaceful life, you're forced to embark on an adventure. In this world of swords, magic, and guns, make good use of your dice and deck to find a way back to tranquility! What can the dice be used for? To change... anything.
